about.summary: Hello! I'm a software engineer with a passion for creating intuitive and engaging digital experiences.
about.specialization: I specialize in full-stack development with expertise in React, TypeScript, and Node.js. My background combines technical proficiency with creative problem-solving, allowing me to build solutions that are both functional and delightful to use.
about.portfolio_description: This portfolio site is designed as a nostalgic throwback to Windows 95/98, reflecting my appreciation for computing history while showcasing modern development techniques.
about.journey: My technical journey has been focused on delivering clean, maintainable code with an eye for detail and user experience. I believe in creating solutions that are not just functional, but also delightful to use.

education.degree: Bachelor of Science in Computer Science
education.description: Graduated with honors. Specialized in Web Technologies and Software Engineering.
